works.description: Like its predecessor, the Apple iPad 2 has been the prime target of haute couture brands and designers since its launch. For the bling-bling lovers, London-based firm Gold & Co. has now unveiled a 24-carat gold plated iPad 2 in Dubai. The Gold & Co gold plated iPad 2 costs AED 20,000 (about $5,500). Other than the iPad 2, the firm has earlier given the gilded treatment to the first version iPad, iPhone and the iPod.
